txt.en: You have slain many mountain-lions in Blackroot Vale.
Stirred by the Dead or some other fell force, the mountain-lions of Blackroot Vale have crept into the valley, seeking more substantial prey.

You have defeated many mountain-lions in Blackroot Vale. Although you did not discover evidence of any fell force driving them deep into the vale, their ferocity could have easily posed a serious threat to the people of Alagrant and Sardol.

Blackroot mountain-lions can be found to the east of Alagrant and as far south as Sardol.\n\nYou have encountered aggressive mountain-lions in the vale, and should cull their numbers for the good of Alagrant and Sardol.

The mountain-lions of Blackroot Vale have grown more aggressive than usual and have begun to lurk near the villages of Alagrant and Sardol.\n\nIf the people of these two villages are to remain safe, the mountain-lions must be slain.
